abstract: United States District Court Judge Paul A Magnuson gives preliminary approval to $10 million settlement of lawsuit brought by customers of Target in connection with 2013 holiday season customer data theft affecting 70 million to 110 million people.
lead_paragraph: The settlement of a class-action suit in federal court would provide $10 million to compensate victims of a 2013 online data theft that affected as many as 110 million people.

headline.main: $10 Million Settlement in Target Data Breach Gets Preliminary Approval
headline.print_headline: $10 Million Settlement in Target Data Breach Gets Preliminary Approval

snippet: The settlement of a class-action suit in federal court would provide $10 million to compensate victims of a 2013 online data theft that affected as many as 110 million people.
